Name: Varnyr
Traits: Fey Ancestry. Varnyr has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put Varnyr to sleep.
Actions: Multiattack. Varnyr makes two attacks. Cane. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.
Reactions: Parry. Varnyr adds 2 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, Varnyr must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
